goal: Make a complex AI topic incredibly simple and engaging for beginners.

blueprint.name: The Hook (First 30 Seconds)
blueprint.technique: Problem-Agitate-Intrigue. Start immediately with a high-energy, relatable problem. Briefly agitate that problem, then introduce the technology as the solution with an intriguing tone.

blueprint.name: The Big Idea with an Analogy (1 Minute)
blueprint.technique: The Simple Analogy. Introduce the AI topic. State the English technical term clearly. Explain it briefly in Thai once. Immediately provide a powerful, easy-to-understand analogy that connects the concept to real life.

blueprint.name: The Deep Dive Story (at least 3 Minutes)
blueprint.technique: Storytelling (Problem -> Action -> Result). Explain the challenge before the tech, how the AI works using the analogy, and the positive result.

blueprint.name: Why It Matters (1 Minute)
blueprint.technique: Broaden the Horizon. Briefly explain the bigger impact of this technology beyond the initial example. What does it mean for the future? Keep it exciting and optimistic.
